hero.description: Share reviews, report issues, and help make your community better. Connect with neighbors and local authorities to create positive change.
hero.feature1.title: Location-Based
hero.feature1.text: Pin reports to exact locations for better community awareness
hero.feature2.title: Community Driven
hero.feature2.text: Share experiences and help others discover important places
hero.feature3.title: Visual Reports
hero.feature3.text: Add photos to make your reports more impactful and clear

header.sheetDescription: Access key sections of the application.

form.reportTypeLabel: What would you like to report?
form.title: Title
form.maxPhotosInfo: Add up to 5 photos to help illustrate your report
form.name: Name
form.emailNote: This field is currently not used. A random email address will be saved during testing.
form.updates: Send me updates about this report
form.issueDescription: Provide detailed information about the issue...
form.submissionSuccessDescription: Thank you for helping improve our city.

reportPage.title: Submit a Report
reportPage.description: Help improve your city by reporting issues or sharing positive experiences

reportsPage.description: Discover what's happening in your community and contribute to making it better
reportsPage.tryAdjustingSearch: Try adjusting your search terms or filters

mapPage.title: City Map
mapPage.description: Explore reports and reviews from your community

features.sectionTitle: Everything you need to improve your city
features.sectionDescription: Powerful features designed to make reporting city issues simple, efficient, and engaging

items.title: Smart Search
items.description: Quickly find places and issues with our intelligent search system

items.title: Interactive Map
items.description: Explore your city with dynamic markers for reports and reviews

items.title: Photo Uploads
items.description: Add visual context to your reports with photos

items.title: Rating System
items.description: Rate and review local places to help others make informed decisions

items.title: Issue Reporting
items.description: Report problems like potholes, damaged infrastructure, and more

items.title: User Profiles
items.description: Track your contributions and build your community reputation

items.title: Real-Time Updates
items.description: Get notified when issues you reported are resolved or updated

items.title: Secure & Private
items.description: Your data is protected with enterprise-grade security measures

stats.sectionDescription: Join thousands of citizens working together to improve urban life

cta.title: Ready to Make a Difference?
cta.description: Join our community of engaged citizens and help create positive change in your city
